name: Escape Velocity (bluegamemc)
description:
Fly through space, dodging asteroids and blowing up, then explore a maze and find your way out!

This game only has a single level (because of the task) but the level has two parts and three different difficulty settings!

Normal,

Hard,

Challenge.

Escape Velocity was made in two weeks and all art, models, music, sfx, code, ect. was made by me.

This game has gamepad support.
